name: BarchartExplorer
description: Interactive barchart for exploring hierarchical datasets. Takes a single dataset or multiple datasets plus a function reduce them to a single set.

data.name: Datasets for the BarchartExplorer
data.description: Add datasets in any order - sequencing is handled automatically.

options.name: None
options.description: No reduction, using a single dataset.

options.name: Absolute Change
options.description: Value difference between a later and earlier period. Max of 2 datasets.

options.name: Percent Change
options.description: Percentage difference between a later and earlier period. Max of 2 datasets.

options.name: Average
options.description: Average of arbitrary number of datasets
